name: Alankar Metal
overview:
Established in the year 1995, we, M/s Alankar Metal Craft, are an eminent organization engaged in manufacturing and supplying a wide range of Sheet Metal Components, Sheet Metal Parts, Metal Components, Precision Sheet Metal Components, Bicycle Parts (Spokes), Bicycle Spokes, Electrical Modular/Metal Boxes, Modular Box, Zinc Plated Modular Box, Sheet Metal Terminal Box Cover and Sheet Metal Clamps.

Product portfolio:

Sheet Metal Pressed Component
Precision Sheet Metal Component
Sheet Metal Part

Our Team:

We are backed by a team of efficient professionals which assists us in catering to the diversified demands of the customers in an effective manner. These professionals are well-versed with the varied aspects of the market.

Quality Assurance:

Since inception, the basic motto of the organization is to provide top notch products to the clients as Alankar Metal Craft believes in quality instead of quantity sale. Therefore, all our product are manufactured using high quality raw material and in strict compliance to the international quality standards.

Our Infrastructure:

We have developed a state-of-the-art infrastructure at Nagpur, Maharashtra, India, which is spread across a vast area. The infrastructure is segregated into different units like manufacturing, production, quality control, administrative and sales & marketing which are handled by our expert professionals.

Client Satisfaction:

Keeping into consideration that a satisfied customer is the desired end of any organization, we treat our customers courteously. Effective customer service serves as an automated instrument for the popularity of our firm. We frequently communicate with the clients to know their exact requirements and serve them accordingly.
